name: ImproCréation
description:
Create your vehicle and carry as much weight as possible through different obstacles to be richly rewarded.
You can't get through it all? Then balance your weights better and add yourself some double wishbone to get there! Take your time and you'll get there, there is no need to hury.

Sand-Box building



Build your vehicle intuitively and easily with a simple first person view. Walk, jump, crouch and sprint to build your vehicle at your own rhythm.


  • Campaign mode
  • Freeroam/Creative mode

Try your création on the fly



Fast and easy to give your création a quick try, when you are satisfied.. Head to the finish line or add more weight and test the limit of it !

You have a creative mind, maybe you also love the way suspension works on vehicle?
